user.name: Mohd
user.title: Junior React Developer
user.bio: A passionate and dedicated junior React developer with hands-on experience in building dynamic and responsive web applications. Specializes in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, and React, creating custom and user-friendly web experiences. Mohd values communication and collaboration, working closely with clients to ensure their needs are met and exceeded.

experience.description: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React, enhancing user experience through innovative UI designs and efficient state management.

projects.name: Blog Comments
projects.description: A React component for displaying and managing blog comments, including author information and profile images fetched from a server.

projects.name: Smart Gadget Facebook Marketing
projects.description: Created market advertising content and strategies to attract consumers for a mobile shop using targeted Facebook posts.
